title: Frontend Developer - dApp 개발팀
content:
주요 업무
                    As a Frontend Developer, you will support multiple decentralized applications. (신입/인턴, 파트타임 가능)- Publishing Web Pages- Improving existing RocketBC projects (e.g. bloks.io)- Supporting Frontend dev…
            더 보기
            As a Frontend Developer, you will support multiple decentralized applications. (신입/인턴, 파트타임 가능)- Publishing Web Pages- Improving existing RocketBC projects (e.g. bloks.io)- Supporting Frontend development of new dApps (decentralized Applications)- Collaborate closely with other developers, engineers, designers, and incubatees

업무 관련 기술 / 활동 분야
        
          jQuery
          Front-end
          JavaScript
          HTML5
          CSS3
          vue.js

채용 상세
                    담당업무- Front End Web development of dApps- Communication and collaboration with other team members- Adding new features/pages for existing services 자격요건- Familiar with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Vue.js-…
            더 보기
            담당업무- Front End Web development of dApps- Communication and collaboration with other team members- Adding new features/pages for existing services 자격요건- Familiar with JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Vue.js- Experience with agile prototyping- Conversational English우대사항- Experience with dApps, blockchain projects- Blockchain Evangelist- Fluent English Speaker
